attributes.additional_details: This government has penalised the people who need help the most , the elderly, and disabled. We need a government to get their priorities right. Labour are not doing the job we all hoped they would when voted in.
attributes.background: Dissolve Parliament and get a general election as soon as possible.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700143
